channel.title: Need help in coding
channel.description: can someone give me the code for admins can ban and unban players like ::banuser (name and ::deban (name) please can someone tell me the code and also i want the code for 508 servers only please ty :D

item.title: Need help in coding
item.dc:creator: @LilJR1 LilJR1
item.description:
@LilJR1 wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:3, topic:249988”]ban

[code] if (command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "bans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have banned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ban..");
            }
        }[/code]

Now,were it says player rights,0=everyone can ban 1= mods can ban 2=admins can ban 3= Only the owner,co owners can ban.[/quote]

-.- this is not a 508 server code for ban can someone tell me plz this give me error and i know this is not 508 server code cause u cant do rights 3 in 608 servers -.- can someone please tell me the correct code -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Need help in coding
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

ban

[code] if (command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "bans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have banned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ban..");
            }
        }[/code]

Now,were it says player rights,0=everyone can ban 1= mods can ban 2=admins can ban 3= Only the owner,co owners can ban.

Read full topic
